reqs: Banking/Non-Banking Financial Company licenses under the Banking Regulation Act, 1949 and Section 45I of the RBI Act, 1934
Registration with RBI for undertaking payment system or activities covered under RBI's subject-specific master directions
Registration with SEBI for securities broking and investment advisory services
Licensing by IRDAI for insurance web aggregators, brokers, and agents
Compliance with data security and privacy regulations under Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY)
Compliance with taxation laws under Central Board of Direct Taxes/Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs
Compliance with anti-trust laws under Competition Commission of India

Compliance with labor laws, including Provident Fund (PF) Registration, Employees' State Insurance (ESI) Registration, Shops and Establishment Act Compliance, Minimum Wages Act, 1948, and Payment of Bonus Act, 1965
Compliance with data protection and privacy regulations under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023
Licensing for foreign exchange services under the Foreign Exchange Department of RBI
Licensing for payment services under the Payment and Settlement Systems Act 2007 (PSS Act)
Registration as a Credit Information Company (CIC) or Account Aggregator (AA) under RBI's regulations

Compliance with RIA Regulations, including mandatory registration, segregation between advisory and distribution services, and prescribed qualifications and NISM certifications for individuals offering advice
